Definition at line 140 of file MemoryBuffer.h.

template<class T >
uint32_t mt::MemoryBuffer< T >::truncate ( uint32_t  startPos,
int32_t  length = -1 
)

Truncate the buffer.

Parameters:
startPos Start position of truncate.
length Length of truncated buffer. By default set to '-1'. In that case the buffer truncated from startPos to end of buffer.
Exceptions:
mt::Exception if startPos is less then 0 or more that size of the buffer.
mt::Exception if length not set to default and startPos+length more than size of the buffer.
mt::Exception if an error occurred at allocating memory.
Returns:
Size of new buffer
